I guess this is one of those tests of the strength of a communities self editing powers.
I mean: free speech; but: not moronic.

If only we could use proof of work to whittle out plebs.

I recently read on HN that there's a Swedish/Danish TV channel that has a technical site/blog where before a visitors allowed to comment or post, it asks them questions about the article.

Maybe some way to disenfranchise people from shit-posting until they build up "P2P"/seed karma could work.

I dunno :-/
